pages.title: Detox Time
pages.text: If you dared to enter the mist without the protections of a $(item)Respirator$(), you may feel a bit ill, due to the sheer $(thing)Toxicity$() of the $(thing)Mist$(). Thankfully, experimentation in my youth led me to discover 6 edibles which can counter this $(thing)Toxicity$(). I suggest you eat one.
$(item)Tinder Fungus$() can be found rarely on $(thing)Forest Islands$(), growing on the side of $(item)Forest Deceiver$() trees.
$(item)Nightberrries$() can be found at night on the water on $(thing)Swamp Islands$().
$(item)Stone Tress Berries$() can be found on $(thing)Taiga Islands$(), rarely harvestable from the leaves of $(item)Stone Trees$().

$(item)Swim Bladders$() can be obtained by killing Desert Fish, encountered by digging or wetting the $(item)Virgin Dry Clay$() lakebeds (layer below the surface) on $(thing)Desert/Savannah Islands$().
$(item)Gold Mushrooms$() can be found growing on the ground in higher elevation $(thing)Tropical Biomes$() (such as Jungle Hills).
$(item)Silver Mushrooms$() can be found growing on the ground in $(thing)Tropics Biomes$().
